content: the crochet queen bee gnome looks absolutely royal in her crown she s very fashionable in her stripes and ruffled skirt and don t forget the little details with her antennae and a stinger too she s an intermediate-level design and includes options for solid or striped legs and braids or no braids the queen bee gnome is excellent for gifts decor bee and gnome lovers imaginative play and more note that the crown also makes a great stand-alone decorative piece for any sort of royal celebration pattern information + your pdf purchase includes written instructions and helpful photographs to aid in construction + the pattern is written in english using us crochet terminology + the pattern is formatted to have one featured image at the beginning of the pattern for reference with all other full-sized images at the end for easy optional printing skills needed + the skill level needed is intermediate but ambitious beginners are always encouraged to try + the techniques you will need to know include chain single_crochet slip_stitch increase invisible decrease working in the back bar of the chain half_double_crochet double_crochet working in the front and back loop only bobble stitch the invisible join and the adjustable magic ring materials needed more specifics are noted within the pattern + yarn in your choice of colors about 250 yds/229 m of worsted/aran + a size e/4 3 5 mm crochet hook + stitch markers + tapestry needle + dritz needle puller optional + pins + scissors + stuffing + chopstick to help stuff finished measurements + using hook size e/4 3 5 mm and worsted yarn the crochet queen bee gnome measures approximately 10 5 inches 27 cm from the tip of the toe to the top of the crown + note the miniature queen bee gnome in the images was made using the same pattern with a 1 50 mm steel 7 hook and size 10 crochet thread it measures approximately 5 5 inches 14 cm from the tip of the toe to the top of the crown thank you thank you for supporting my small business it means the world wishing you a blessed day as you spread kindness and creativity happy crocheting find more this pattern along with many other designs can be found here on ravelry and
